alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of central Piscataquis, eastern Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1159 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Lille to near Blanchard. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Millinocket, Dover-Foxcroft, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Van Buren, Greenville, Guilford, Patten, Brownville Junction, Mount Katahdin, Ripogenus, Portage, Milo, Mapleton, East Millinocket, Washburn, Mars Hill and Medway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 242 and 289. US Highway 1 between Blaine and Van Buren. State Highway 11 between Milo and Portage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
